validations.maxLength: The entered text is too long. Max {max} characters accepted

i18n.unsupportedLocale: the requested language is not supported

info.title: Information on this site
info.text: The data you enter on the forms of this static site will be stored locally on your device (smartphone, tablet or computer) and will not be communicated to our servers. After having completed the checklist, your device will generate a QR Code containing all the information you will have provided. When requested to do so, you will show the generated QR Code to the aeromedical examiner (AME).

disclaimer.title: Consent to the release of information
disclaimer.text: I hereby authorize the release of all information contained in this form to the AME and, where necessary, to the medical assessor of the licensing authority. I am aware that such information will become and remain property of the licensing authority, provided that I or my physician will have access to them according to national laws.

birthWhen.label: Date of birth
birthWhen.formatExplain: Please, specify the date of birth respecting this format: yyyy-mm-dd (e.g., 1971-11-15).

qrcodeGenerate.title: QR Code
qrcodeGenerate.text: Congratulations, you have completed the checklist. You can show the generated QR Code to the medical examiner.

qrcodeScan.title: Scan QR Code
qrcodeScan.text: Please, scan the QR Code provided by the examinee.

scanner.noCamera: Oooops! This device has not any camera to scan the QR Code
scanner.start: Start the camera to capture the QR Code

reviewReport.title: Flagged answers
reviewReport.text: Note: the following answers needs further inquiry.
